author: diegolosada
content:
Hi!,

    as we are finishing our config for the Raspi Kintsugi image we are adding a flag for each client in order to make a port change more intuitive for the user.

There are a lot of options here depending on the client. As this is a key config flag (particularly for running several clients at once in a testnet) we thing it should be somehow standarized. These are the current flags:

Prysm: --p2p-tcp-port --p2p-udp-port
Lighthouse: --port
Teku: --p2p-port --p2p-udp-port
Nimbus: --tcp-port --udp-port

Geth: --port
Nethermind: --port
Besu: --p2p-port

Personally, I like the --port flag and think that all clients should include it.

author: potuz
content: This may be possible on prysm but it will require a change on logic cause historically tcp and discovery are in different ports

author: diegolosada
content: Sure,  I think that the --port flag should be additional to the TCP and UDP flags (meaning that --port opens both UDP and TCP  in the same port).
